Description: Following an investigation by the Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs, Aramark Education Services LLC entered into a conciliation agreement to resolve claims of systemic hiring discrimination. OFCCP found that the contractor discriminated against 335 male and African-American applicants for food service worker positions with Aramark, a federal contractor in Lubbock, Texas.
Agency: Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs
Info Source: https://www.dol.gov/newsroom/releases/ofccp/ofccp20151123
